chapter.title: Presentation
chapter.para: Background lets you configure a background for the main jEdit text area.
If necessary, the background image is tiled to fill the entire text area.

chapter.title: Usage
chapter.para: The background image can be configured in the Background option pane in the jEdit global options: Utilities> Global Options...> Plugin Options> Background.
The accepted image formats include GIF, JPEG and PNG (JDK 1.3).
The Backgroundguimenuitem> action (Plugins> Background) toggles the background visibility for the current text area.
